page.title: 13RAWMARSH AND PARKGATE
page.content: I shall try to describe{Rawmarsh}for those people who are not lucky enough to live here. As you come into {Rawmarsh}down at{Parkgate,}it is quite a derelict place. There is a disused steelworks and it is mostly wasteland. A little further up are the shops. These sell mostly antique furniture, though there are video shops, a hair- dressers, a bakery, newsagents, a library, a petrol station and a dental surgery close by. On the top of {Rawmarsh Hill}is{St. Mary's Church}and across from it stands the rectory. Most of the houses are semi-detached and terraced. The schools in Rawmarsh are St. Joseph's, St. Mary's, Ashwood, Monkwood, Thorogate, Rosehill and Sandhill. There is also a large comp- rehensive school. Rawmarsh has a swim ming pool which we visit on a Tuesday.
